Instruction: In a medium stock pot, cook the beef and onion until browned, about 10 minutes; drain any excess grease if necessary.
Incorporate the tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, beans, corn, and taco seasoning. Bring the mixture to a boil, then lower the heat and let it simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with cheese, corn chips, sour cream, and olives.
